summary: Comprehensive testing of AI-Powered Mind ebook application iteration 2. Fixed clipboard issue and tested all core features including navigation, model interactions, search, journal, and mind map functionality.

design_issues.issue: React Flow console warnings about edge creation with undefined source handle IDs
design_issues.details: Multiple warnings about undefined source handle IDs in React Flow edges, but functionality works correctly

passed_tests: Backend API - All 11 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Landing page loads with hero, dedication, domains grid
Navigation bar links work: Explore, Mind Map, Search, Journal
Explore page shows 6 domain cards correctly
Domain page shows 40 model cards for thinking-smarter section
Model card expansion reveals explanation, example, AI prompt with copy button
Model detail page navigation working correctly
Copy button functionality working (fixed clipboard permissions issue)
Search loads all models initially and filters by text query
Search filter pills filter by section correctly (40 results for thinking-smarter)
Journal allows writing text and saving reflection entries
Journal context preserved when navigating from model pages
Mind map renders React Flow with 43 nodes and clickable navigation
Conclusion page loads with key takeaways and challenge content

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major functionality working, minor React Flow warnings)
